mapper.select: select buyno, id, title, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, type, region, minprice, maxprice, status, bigClassifier, mediumClassifier, regdate from ( select /*+ INDEX_ASC(buy pk_buy) */ rownum rn, buyno, id, title, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, type, region, minprice, maxprice, status, bigClassifier, mediumClassifier, regdate from buy where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and regdate BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-#{month})+1) - TO_CHAR(sysdate,'DD') and TRUNC(LAST_DAY(sysdate)) +0.99999421 and status = '등록' ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from buy where buyno > 0 and regdate BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-#{month})+1) - TO_CHAR(sysdate,'DD') and TRUNC(LAST_DAY(sysdate)) +0.99999421 and status = '등록'
mapper.update: update buy set status = '삭제' where buyno = #{buyNo}
mapper.select: select buyno, id, title, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, type, region, minprice, maxprice, status, bigClassifier, mediumClassifier, regdate from ( select /*+ INDEX_ASC(buy pk_buy) */ rownum rn, buyno, id, title, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, type, region, minprice, maxprice, status, bigClassifier, mediumClassifier, regdate from buy where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and regdate BETWEEN TO_DATE( #{startDate} , 'YYMMDD') AND TO_DATE( #{endDate}, 'YYMMDD') ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from buy where regdate BETWEEN TO_DATE( #{startDate} , 'YYMMDD') AND TO_DATE( #{endDate}, 'YYMMDD')

select sellno, id, itemname, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, type, region, itemcondition, price, picture, status, MediumClassifier, bigClassifier from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(sell pk_sell) */ rownum rn, sellno, id, itemname, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, type, region, itemcondition, price, picture, status, MediumClassifier, bigClassifier from sell where
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and status = '등록' ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select count(*) from sell where
sellno > 0 and status = '등록'
mapper.update: update sell set status = '삭제' where sellno = #{sellNo}
mapper.select: select dealno, buyid, sellid, itemname, picture, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, price, regdate, status from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(deal pk_deal) */ rownum rn, d.* , s.itemname, s.picture, s.keyword1, s.keyword2, s.keyword3 from deal d, sell s where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and d.sellno = s.sellno ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from deal d, sell s where d.sellno = s.sellno
select d.*, s.* from deal d , sell s where d.sellno = s.sellno and dealno = #{dealNo}
select d.*, s.* from deal d , sell s where d.sellno = s.sellno and d.status = #{status}
select count(*) from deal d, sell s where d.sellno = s.sellno and d.status = #{status}
mapper.update: update MEMBER set isMember = 'n' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select wishno, sellno, sellid, itemname, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, type ,region, itemcondition, price, picture, status from (select /*+ INDEX_DESC(wishList pk_wishList) */ rownum rn, w.wishno, w.id, w.sellno, w.sellid, s.id, s.itemname, s.keyword1, s.keyword2, s.keyword3, s.type, s.region, s.itemcondition, s.price, s.picture, s.status from wishlist w, sell s where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and w.sellno = s.sellno and w.sellid = s.id ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from wishlist where wishno > 0
mapper.delete: delete from wishlist w where w.wishno = (select distinct w.wishno from wishlist w, sell s where w.sellNo = #{sellNo})
